name: Finding Rick
description:
This is our entry for Global Game Jam 2021. Spent 4-5 days developing the game with a group that consisted of 4 passionate individuals.

The following are my main contributions to the game:

  • AI Programming
    1. Developed a state machine that handles the logic behind the Enemy's behaviour in-game (Attack, Chase, Patrol, etc.).
    2. Utilized Unity's Animation Events to implement accurate hitboxes and audio cues.
    3. Implemented a headshot feature, where the player can deal more damage shooting to the head compared to shooting other parts of the body.
  • Puzzle Design and Logic
    1. Designed the concept of the puzzles.
    2. Implemented the backend logic on how the puzzles work in-game.
  • Team Management
    1. Taught the team how to utilize Source Control (Git, GitHub, SourceTree).
  • Rick
    1. The idea of Rick.
